cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of beam alignment in millimeter wave (mmWave) systems, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The proposed algorithm is based on stochastic optimization and exploits the correlation and unimodality properties of the model, which are topics related to control systems (cs.SY) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper specifically mentions massive MIMO systems, which is a topic related to multimedia (cs.MM).
